title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - Apr 16 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - Apr 16 2022
description:
Musk Twitter takeover could be Democrats' digital Waterloo. Clay says, "This could be the biggest moment for free speech -- and I don't think I'm exaggerating this -- in most of our lives." Clay and Buck have invitations out to Elon Musk to be on the show. Buck says, Musk can smoke whatever he wants when he's here; he will not judge. Male pretending to be a woman impregnates two women in NJ prison. Buck says, "Slippery slope is not a fallacy, it's a reality." Psaki can't reconcile lifting Title 42, extending travel mask mandate. Dirty: Biden DOJ launches Tesla investigation to scuttle Twitter bid. C&B take calls. Fauci hailed China's lockdown as a great success. Buck says he thinks Fauci, who he "despises" and thinks is responsible for the ruination of many lives, would have done it in the U.S. if he could have.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
